column4: Hi, I'm trying to install the game Black and white with crossover..  The game seemed to install fine, but as soon as I get past the intro movie, it crashes.  Anyone have any previous knowledge or ideas on this game?
http://appdb.winehq.org/ is very useful to troubleshoot wine games
does that work with crossover, usually?
don't know. they use the same base but I know crossover is not 100% compatible
